snippet.title: [Android/iOS] BattleCross - Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
BattleCross - Badminton Card Battle Indie RPG

In the world of BattleCross, badminton is a common and popular activity. In such a world lived a teenager, living in the Town of Azura.. Despite being young and new to the sport, the main character has a strong passion towards Badminton, where he dreamt of winning the State Champion one day. In order to fulfil his wish, he trains hard and seek ways to learn new skills (collecting cards) in the town. There are those who support him and sincerely wish for his success, while there are also some who take him as a rival competing towards the same goal. Along his journey, he met a lot of people, and eventually found out about an underground organization that is controlling the World\’s badminton from the shadow, and also the whereabout of his long lost father… Will you help him fulfil his seemingly impossible dream?

- Build unique deck from a wide range of Skill Cards.
- Explore around the world, unlock different areas and gameplay features.
- Help the people around, uncover their backstories and forge a stronger bond with them.
- Multiple choice decision making that affects story progression.
- Collect Sports Gear like racket, shoe, wristband and more.
- PVP Battle with players from all around the world.

BattleCross on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.azurabrothers.battlecross 
BattleCross on App Store: Coming soon 

Genre: RPG, CCG 
Developed and published by: Azura Brothers Studio 
Platform: Android (iOS coming soon) 
Price: Free 

About Us 
Inspired by great mobile games such as Ninja Saga and Pixelmon Hunter, we are a team of 2 brothers, who aim to develop unique and creative indie games.

Contact Us
